name: bayesian-packer_client
description: Archive your large-scale infrastructure more secure and effectively using our command-line tool and keep control of organization data

scripts.eleventy:serve: npm run clean && set ELEVENTY_ENV="development" && npm run tsc && eleventy --serve --port 10033 --watch
scripts.eleventy:debug: set DEBUG="Eleventy*" && npm run tsc && eleventy --serve --port 10033 --watch

author: Damien Bayes <damien.bayes.db@gmail.com>
